name: frizbee-wasm
description: Fast fuzzy matching via SIMD smith waterman - WASM package for browser use

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --features wasm && node fix-types.js
scripts.build:node: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg-node --features wasm && node fix-types.js
scripts.build:bundler: wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg-bundler --features wasm && node fix-types.js
